replies.bodyText: Honestly, I am still unsure on this Optional topic and would love to get an expert guide. Generally speaking, getting rid of null (and null checks) by using Optional to denote something (especially for public API) is absent sounds like a good idea. However, sometimes it results in more bloated code that is really difficult to tolerate. And I'm also unclear if there should be a difference when using Optional as a return value versus as method arguments.
